# Georgetown Rotary PBS Image Generation Template

**Version:** 1.0  
**Last Updated:** 2025-12-18  
**Style:** Refined Line Art with Color Fields

---

## Quick Reference

### Rotary Palette for Images

| Role | Color | Hex |
|------|-------|-----|
| Line art | Black | #000000 |
| Line art (alt) | Dark Blue | #004A8A |
| Color field (default) | Rotary Azure | #0067C8 |
| Accent | Rotary Gold | #F7A81B |
| Background | Platinum | #E4DFDA |

### Areas of Focus Colors

| Area of Focus | Hex |
|---------------|-----|
| Peacebuilding & Conflict Prevention | #0067C8 |
| Disease Prevention & Treatment | #E02927 |
| Water, Sanitation & Hygiene | #00A2E0 |
| Maternal & Child Health | #901F93 |
| Basic Education & Literacy | #FF7600 |
| Community Economic Development | #00ADBB |
| Supporting the Environment | #009739 |

### Line Art Subjects

| Subject | Best For |
|---------|----------|
| Interlocking circles | Community, fellowship, generic Rotary |
| Concentric ripples | Water, spreading impact |
| Rising spiral | Education, growth |
| Two paths converging | Peace, partnerships |
| Branching upward form | Environment, development |
| Protective arc | Health, maternal/child |
| Ascending stepped form | Economic development |

### Accent Shapes

| Shape | Suggests |
|-------|----------|
| Circle | Unity, completeness |
| Arc/crescent | Movement, progress |
| Dot cluster (2-3) | Spread, reach |
| None | Restraint, simplicity |

### Common Aspect Ratios

| Use Case | Dimensions | Ratio |
|----------|------------|-------|
| Open Graph / Social | 1200×630 | 1.9:1 |
| Hero image | 1536×1024 | 3:2 |
| Square / Avatar | 1024×1024 | 1:1 |
| LinkedIn banner | 1584×396 | 4:1 |

---

## Template: Generic Georgetown Rotary Image

```
SUBJECT:
organization: Georgetown Rotary Club
narrative focus: [DESCRIBE THE CORE MESSAGE OR THEME]
values: [LIST 2-3 VALUES: e.g., service, fellowship, leadership]

STYLE:
refined continuous line art with color blocks
editorial illustration quality
professional, warm, [ADDITIONAL MOOD WORD]
[TONE] tone

PALETTE:
#000000 (black) for line art
#0067C8 (rotary azure) large color field
#F7A81B (rotary gold) accent shape
#E4DFDA (platinum) background

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
single continuous line drawing: [SELECT FROM LINE ART SUBJECTS]
one large organic azure shape behind line art
one small gold [SELECT FROM ACCENT SHAPES] suggesting [MEANING]
[DESCRIBE ENERGY/MOVEMENT]

COMPOSITION:
[DIMENSIONS AND RATIO]
[DESCRIBE POSITIONING OF MAIN ELEMENTS]
[DESCRIBE COLOR FIELD PLACEMENT]
negative space [LOCATION] for text overlay
[DESCRIBE OVERALL FLOW/ENERGY]

CONSTRAINTS:
no text, no logos, no words
no literal Rotary wheel or official symbols
line art simple and continuous (not detailed/fussy)
color blocks solid (no gradients)
professional editorial quality, not cartoony
[FINAL MOOD DESCRIPTION]
```

---

## Template: Area of Focus Project Image

```
SUBJECT:
service project: [SPECIFIC PROJECT DESCRIPTION]
area of focus: [SELECT ONE: Peacebuilding | Disease Prevention | Water & Sanitation | Maternal & Child Health | Education & Literacy | Economic Development | Environment]
narrative focus: [CORE IMPACT OR MEANING]

STYLE:
refined continuous line art with color blocks
editorial illustration quality
professional, purposeful, [ADDITIONAL MOOD WORD]
[TONE APPROPRIATE TO AREA OF FOCUS] tone

PALETTE:
#000000 (black) for line art
#[AREA OF FOCUS HEX] ([AREA NAME]) large color field
#F7A81B (rotary gold) accent shape
#E4DFDA (platinum) background

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
single continuous line drawing: [SELECT FROM LINE ART SUBJECTS]
one large organic shape in [AREA COLOR] behind line art
[ACCENT DESCRIPTION OR "no additional accent"]
[DESCRIBE ENERGY/MOVEMENT]

COMPOSITION:
[DIMENSIONS AND RATIO]
[DESCRIBE POSITIONING]
[DESCRIBE COLOR FIELD PLACEMENT]
negative space [LOCATION] for text overlay
[DESCRIBE OVERALL FLOW]

CONSTRAINTS:
no text, no logos, no words
no [LITERAL OBJECTS TO AVOID FOR THIS PROJECT]
line art simple and continuous (not detailed/fussy)
color blocks solid (no gradients)
professional editorial quality, not cartoony
[MOOD MATCHING AREA OF FOCUS]
```

---

## Template: Open Graph / Social Media Image

```
SUBJECT:
content: [WHAT IS THIS IMAGE FOR: announcement, event, project, generic]
narrative focus: [KEY MESSAGE]
audience: [WHO WILL SEE THIS]

STYLE:
refined continuous line art with color blocks
editorial illustration quality
professional, [MOOD WORD], confident
[TONE] tone

PALETTE:
#000000 (black) for line art
#[SELECT COLOR HEX] ([COLOR NAME]) large color field
#F7A81B (rotary gold) accent shape
#E4DFDA (platinum) background

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
single continuous line drawing: [SELECT FROM LINE ART SUBJECTS]
one large organic [COLOR] shape behind line art
[ACCENT DESCRIPTION]
[ENERGY/MOVEMENT]

COMPOSITION:
1200x630 pixels (1.9:1 aspect ratio for Open Graph)
[ELEMENT POSITIONING]
[COLOR FIELD PLACEMENT]
negative space [LEFT/RIGHT] for text overlay
[OVERALL ENERGY]

CONSTRAINTS:
no text, no logos, no words
no literal [OBJECTS TO AVOID]
line art simple and continuous (not detailed/fussy)
color blocks solid (no gradients)
professional editorial quality, not cartoony
[FINAL MOOD]
```

---

## Ready-to-Use Prompts

### Georgetown Rotary Default OG Image

```
SUBJECT:
organization: Georgetown Rotary Club
narrative focus: community leadership, service above self, professional fellowship
values: trusted, established, action-oriented

STYLE:
refined continuous line art with color blocks
editorial illustration quality
professional, warm, confident
welcoming and purposeful tone

PALETTE:
#000000 (black) for line art
#0067C8 (rotary azure) large color field
#F7A81B (rotary gold) accent shape
#E4DFDA (platinum) background

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
single continuous line drawing: interlocking circular forms suggesting connection, community, and the spirit of Rotary
one large organic azure shape behind line art, flowing horizontally
one small gold circle near the intersection of forms suggesting unity and purpose
sense of connection, fellowship, and shared mission

COMPOSITION:
1200x630 pixels (1.9:1 aspect ratio for Open Graph)
circular forms centered with slight rightward flow
azure color field flows behind and supports the forms
gold accent at or near the central intersection
negative space on left for potential text overlay
balanced, welcoming, professional energy

CONSTRAINTS:
no text, no logos, no words
no literal Rotary wheel — suggest connection abstractly
line art simple and continuous (not detailed/fussy)
color blocks solid (no gradients)
professional editorial quality, not cartoony
warm, trustworthy, community-focused mood
```

### Speaker Event Announcement

```
SUBJECT:
event: Georgetown Rotary speaker program
narrative focus: knowledge sharing, inspiration, community learning
values: professional development, fellowship, engagement

STYLE:
refined continuous line art with color blocks
editorial illustration quality
professional, engaging, welcoming
dynamic and inviting tone

PALETTE:
#000000 (black) for line art
#0067C8 (rotary azure) large color field
#F7A81B (rotary gold) accent shape
#E4DFDA (platinum) background

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
single continuous line drawing: rising spiral suggesting ideas and growth
one large organic azure shape behind line art
one small gold arc at the apex suggesting illumination or insight
upward, aspirational energy

COMPOSITION:
1200x630 pixels (1.9:1 aspect ratio for Open Graph)
spiral rises from lower left toward upper right
azure color field supports and follows the upward movement
gold accent at the top suggesting breakthrough or inspiration
negative space on right for speaker name overlay
dynamic upward flow

CONSTRAINTS:
no text, no logos, no words
no literal microphones, podiums, or people
line art simple and continuous (not detailed/fussy)
color blocks solid (no gradients)
professional editorial quality, not cartoony
engaging, professional, inspiring mood
```

### Service Project Highlight

```
SUBJECT:
content: service project showcase
narrative focus: community impact, hands-on service, making a difference
values: action, service above self, tangible results

STYLE:
refined continuous line art with color blocks
editorial illustration quality
professional, warm, purposeful
active and grounded tone

PALETTE:
#000000 (black) for line art
#00ADBB (turquoise - community/economic development) large color field
#F7A81B (rotary gold) accent shape
#E4DFDA (platinum) background

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
single continuous line drawing: branching upward form suggesting growth and building
one large organic turquoise shape behind line art
small cluster of 2-3 gold dots suggesting multiple points of impact
sense of growth, progress, and tangible results

COMPOSITION:
1200x630 pixels (1.9:1 aspect ratio for Open Graph)
branching form grows from lower center toward upper right
turquoise color field grounds and supports the growth
gold accents scattered at branch points
negative space on left for project title overlay
upward diagonal energy suggesting progress

CONSTRAINTS:
no text, no logos, no words
no literal tools, buildings, or people
line art simple and continuous (not detailed/fussy)
color blocks solid (no gradients)
professional editorial quality, not cartoony
warm, active, impactful mood
```

---

## Quality Checklist

Before using generated images:

- [ ] Line art is simple and continuous
- [ ] Color blocks are solid (no gradients)
- [ ] Maximum 3 colors (line + field + accent)
- [ ] No resemblance to official Rotary wheel
- [ ] No text, logos, or labels in image
- [ ] Renders clearly at target size
- [ ] Mood matches intended use
- [ ] Background is Platinum (#E4DFDA)

---

## Iteration Tips

If the AI result isn't right, ask:

| Problem | Ask For |
|---------|---------|
| Too complex | "Make the line art simpler" |
| Too small | "Make the color field larger" |
| Wrong position | "Move the [element] to [location]" |
| Too busy | "Add more negative space" |
| Wrong mood | "Make it more [warm/professional/energetic]" |
| Gradients appeared | "Use only solid, flat colors" |
| Text appeared | "Remove all text and labels" |
